heading: System developer
preamble: Specialized in building large-scale digital products for banking and e-commerce using modern cloud-native stacks.
mainBody: I have a genuine and deep technical interest and the fact that I'm very curious is the key to why I love solving problems and learn new techniques. Started my programming career in the late 80's and nowadays I spend most of my days architecting and delivering enterprise web platforms using React, Node.js, Kubernetes, Azure services and CI/CD pipelines with a strong focus on performance, accessibility and developer experience.
